alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and Madison Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Boston to 10 miles east of Woodville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Lee, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Pinetta, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Lovett, Wacissa, Hanson, Wacissa Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Goose Pasture and Iddo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
